name: ai2-enterprise-platform
description: AI2 Enterprise Platform - Modular Financial Management System

scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:modules && npm run build:core
scripts.build:modules: npm run build:ai && npm run build:subscription && npm run build:connectors && npm run build:analytics && npm run build:notifications
scripts.start:core:standalone: cross-env ENABLE_AI=false ENABLE_SUBSCRIPTION=false ENABLE_ANALYTICS=false ENABLE_CONNECTORS=false ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS=false npm run start:core
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:subscription" "npm run start:ai" "npm run start:connectors" "npm run start:analytics" "npm run start:notifications"
scripts.start:premium: cross-env ENABLE_AI=true ENABLE_SUBSCRIPTION=true ENABLE_ANALYTICS=true ENABLE_CONNECTORS=true ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS=true npm run start:all
scripts.start:enterprise: cross-env SCALING_PHASE=enterprise CLUSTER_MODE=true CLUSTER_WORKERS=8 ENABLE_AI=true ENABLE_SUBSCRIPTION=true ENABLE_ANALYTICS=true ENABLE_CONNECTORS=true ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS=true ENABLE_MULTI_TENANT=true npm run start:all
scripts.test:all: npm run test:shared && npm run test:core && npm run test:modules
scripts.test:modules: concurrently "npm run test:ai" "npm run test:subscription" "npm run test:connectors" "npm run test:analytics" "npm run test:notifications"
scripts.lint:all: concurrently "npm run lint:shared" "npm run lint:core" "npm run lint:modules"
scripts.lint:modules: concurrently "npm run lint:ai" "npm run lint:subscription" "npm run lint:connectors" "npm run lint:analytics" "npm run lint:notifications"
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:core && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:modules: concurrently "npm run clean:ai" "npm run clean:subscription" "npm run clean:connectors" "npm run clean:analytics" "npm run clean:notifications"

author: AI2 Enterprise Platform Team
